projects.title: Artisanal Gold Miners
projects.description: Comprehensive assessment and support for artisanal gold mining operations in Tabora region. Our team provided geological guidance, safety assessments, and resource evaluation to help small-scale miners optimize their operations.

projects.title: Artisanal Miners
projects.description: Technical support and geological assessment for artisanal mining operations in Morogoro. Provided training on sustainable mining practices and resource management.

projects.title: Beryllium
projects.description: Beryllium exploration and assessment project in Namtumbo district. Conducted detailed geological surveys and sampling programs to evaluate the beryllium potential of the area.

projects.title: Beryllium Prospecting
projects.description: Advanced beryllium prospecting program utilizing modern exploration techniques including geochemical sampling, geological mapping, and geophysical surveys.

projects.title: Coal Outcrop Mapping
projects.description: Detailed geological mapping of coal outcrops in Liweta area in Tanzania. Comprehensive structural analysis and coal seam characterization to support resource estimation.

projects.title: Core Drilling
projects.description: Professional core drilling services for mineral exploration and resource definition. Our experienced team ensures high-quality core recovery and accurate geological logging across various mineral exploration projects.

projects.title: Cu-Zn Exploration
projects.description: Copper-zinc exploration program in Mpanda district. Comprehensive exploration including soil sampling, trenching, and geophysical surveys to identify mineralized zones.

projects.title: Dolomite Prospecting
projects.description: Dolomite prospecting and resource assessment in Dodoma region. Detailed geological mapping and sampling to evaluate the quality and quantity of dolomite deposits.

projects.title: Face Mapping in Coal Mine
images: images/projects/Face mapping in a coal mine.jpg
projects.description: Underground face mapping services for active coal mining operations. Detailed structural and stratigraphic mapping to optimize mining operations and ensure safety.

projects.title: Gold Mineralization
projects.description: Gold exploration and mineralization study in Mazizi area, Morogoro region. Comprehensive geological investigation including mapping, sampling, and resource potential assessment.

projects.title: Graphite Kyanite Gneiss Stockpile
images: images/projects/Graphite kyanite gneiss stockpile in Merelani.jpg
projects.description: Stockpile assessment and quality control for graphite-kyanite-gneiss material in Merelani. Detailed sampling and analysis to determine commercial viability.

projects.title: Graphite Kyanite Gneiss
projects.description: Geological assessment of graphite-kyanite-gneiss deposits in Merelani area. Detailed mineralogical studies and resource evaluation.

projects.title: Pegmatite Lithium Exploration
projects.description: Lithium exploration in pegmatite deposits around Dodoma region. Comprehensive exploration program including geological mapping, geochemical sampling, and resource assessment.

projects.title: Quartz Prospecting
projects.description: Quartz prospecting and quality assessment in Morogoro region. Evaluation of quartz deposits for industrial and commercial applications.
